name: Entei
flavorText:
Volcanoes erupt
when it barks. Un­
able to restrain its extreme power,
it races headlong
around the land.

previous.name: Raikou
previous.flavorText:
The rain clouds it
carries let it
fire thunderbolts at will. They say
that it descended
with lightning.

next.name: Suicune
next.flavorText:
It races around the world to
purify fouled water. It dashes
away with the north wind.

when it barks. Un­
